name: 3D Snow Plow Racing- Extreme Off-Road Winter Race Simulator Free Version
name_original: 3D Snow Plow Racing- Extreme Off-Road Winter Race Simulator Free Version
description:
3D Snow Plow RacingGet ready for Extreme winter Racing in this amazing Snow Plow Game. Plow through the snow in an attempt to win the race. Don’t drive off the road or hit traffic.


Features:
-Realistic 3D graphics
-3 Snow Plows to choose from
-Falling Rock Hazards.
